programme.title: Steel Dawn, (1987, Science fiction)
programme.desc: A nomad warrior must help save a beautiful woman and her young son from a band of henchmen stalking them through the desert after a nuclear war.

programme.title: The Wraith, (1986, Supernatural Horror)
programme.desc: Jake is killed by neighborhood thugs, and returns as a mystical figure (The Wraith) to gain revenge. Starring Charlie Sheen and Randy Quaid.

programme.title: Mad Max, (1980, Action)
programme.desc: Max and the gang's worlds converge when the gang wants Max as badly as he wants them, especially after they target him for the death of their former leader.

programme.title: First Blood, (1982, Action)
programme.desc: A soft-spoken Vietnam vet drifts into a small town looking for no trouble, but finds it in the form of a psychotic local sheriff who finds pleasure in hating him for no reason.

programme.title: Rambo: First Blood Part II, (1985, Action)
programme.desc: John Rambo is sent on assignment back to Southeast Asia to uncover evidence of still missing POWs, and ends up with his hands full when he comes up against Vietnamese soldiers still guarding the camps.

programme.title: Rambo III, (1988, Action)
programme.desc: Rambo refuses to join his friend and former mentor, Colonel Trautman, on a mission to Afghanistan. The mission fails and Trautman is captured by Russian troops. Now Rambo must infiltrate the Russian fortress to save his only friend.

programme.title: Mission: Impossible - Rogue Nation, (2018, Action)
programme.desc: Ethan and team take on their most impossible mission yet, eradicating the Syndicate - an International rogue organization as highly skilled as they are, committed to destroying the IMF.

programme.title: Deep Impact, (1998, Science fiction)
programme.desc: When a couple of young astronomers discover an enormous comet on course to collide with Earth, the countdown to doomsday begins and the human race embarks on the fight for survival.

programme.title: The Core, (2003, Science fiction)
programme.desc: The Earth has stopped rotating because of a change in the planet's core temperature. To restore the normal temperature, astronauts must travel to the center and detonate a nuclear bomb before the core superheats and destroys all life on the surface.

programme.title: Clear and Present Danger, (1994, Action)
programme.desc: When his mentor Admiral James Greer becomes ill, Ryan is appointed acting CIA Director of Intelligence.

programme.title: Timeline, (2003, Science fiction)
programme.desc: Based on the Michael Crichton novel. TIMELINE tells the story of a professor who inadvertently catapults himself back to 14th-century France, in the middle of the 100 Years War.

programme.title: Top Secret!, (1984, Comedy)
programme.desc: Top Secret! pits American rock star Nick Rivers against the dreaded East German High Command. It's a race against time as Nick teams up with Hillary Flammond to find her father.

programme.title: The Out-of-Towners (1999), (1998, Comedy)
programme.desc: A Neil Simon comedy that follows a couple's mishaps as they travel to New York for a job interview. A series of comedic disasters follow that might make one think twice before visiting the Big Apple.

programme.title: Naruto and Sasuke release their ultimate weapons against each other, and just in time, Kakashi arrives to stop the fight.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: The Sound Ninja Four, Kidomaru, Sakon, Jirobo and Tayuya, suddenly appear before Sasuke. Sakura is concerned about the Curse Mark placed on Sasuke by Orochimaru…
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Sakura’s pleas fall on deaf ears, and Sasuke leaves Hidden Leaf Village. When Tsunade learns of this, she summons Shikamaru to lead his first mission as a chunin.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: The Sound Ninja Four race toward Orochimaru’s lair with Sasuke in hand. They’re discovered and challenged by the jonin Genma and Raido…
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Naruto and the others are trapped in Jirobo’s Earth Dome Prison. They try to pound their way out, but the walls regenerate each time.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: After they are freed from the Earth Dome Prison, Shikamaru and the others take off after the remaining Sound while Choji stays behind.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: After Choji takes the yellow pill it looks as if he may win the battle, until Jirobo transforms into Second State, giving him immense power.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Assuming that the Leaf squad could never get past Jirobo, the remaining Sound ninja don’t bother to lay traps along the way.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Neji takes on Kidomaru while the others continue their pursuit of Sasuke and the remaining Sound ninja.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Kidomaru changes tactics and creates a bow and arrow to attack Neji’s blind spot.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Naruto, Shikamaru, Kiba and Akamaru are in hot pursuit of Sasuke and the Sound ninja. Naruto and Kiba are upset that they have been unable to catch up and decide to try a surprise attack at night.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Akamaru sets explosives in the trees to trap Sakon. But an incensed Sakon turns the tables, and the explosives end up sending Kiba, Akamaru and Sakon off a cliff.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Shikamaru is determined to stop Tayuya, but she uses her Summoning Jutsu to call forth three giants. Meanwhile, on the plains, the battle between Kimimaro and Naruto is about to begin.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Ukon, who is able to infiltrate the bodies of others, enters Kiba’s body and tries to merge with his cells.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: An injured Kiba and Akamaru barely escape from Sakon and Ukon. Naruto is locked in battle with Kimimaro…
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Shikamaru succeeds in trapping Tayuya with his Shadow Possession Jutsu. But Tayuya moves to her Second State and fights back with enormous strength.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: With Rock Lee there to take on Kimimaro, Naruto is free to chase after Sasuke, who has awakened.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Shikamaru, Kiba and Lee are at the limits of their strength when Gaara, Temari and Kankuro appear to assist their Leaf allies.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Kimimaro realizes that close combat is impossible against Gaara’s wall of sand, so he moves further away for a long-distance attack.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Kimimaro succeeds in shattering Gaara’s protective sand shield and attacks Gaara. Naruto finally catches up to Sasuke…
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: With the Curse Mark covering half his body, Sasuke is no longer the Sasuke of old. Naruto charges at this new Sasuke who has turned his back on his closest comrades.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Naruto tries desperately to change Sasuke’s mind, but Sasuke is determined to go to Orochimaru. He tells Naruto that in order to surpass his brother, Itachi, power and hatred are necessary.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Naruto is brought down by Sasuke’s Fire Style: Fireball Jutsu. It is a jutsu passed down through generations of the Uchiha family…
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Sasuke quietly watches as Naruto sinks deeper in the water. He recalls the past when the Uchiha clan was cruelly slaughtered.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Kakashi uses his Summoning Jutsu and sends ninja dogs to track Naruto and Sasuke. With his newfound strength, Sasuke is serious about bringing down Naruto…
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Naruto releases his Nine-Tail chakra and sends Sasuke flying. Sasuke counters with his Fire Style Jutsu, but Naruto extinguishes the flames easily.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Naruto’s Nine-Tail chakra seems to move with a will of its own as it counters Sasuke’s powerful attacks.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: The fierce battle with Sasuke leaves Naruto unconscious. Kakashi finally arrives at his side.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Sakura tries to sneak out of the village to find Sasuke, but Naruto intercepts her.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Naruto, Sakura and Jiraiya search for information in a town in the Land of Rice Paddies.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Naruto, Sakura and Sasame are attacked by Kamikiri, Jigumo and Kagero of the Fuma Clan.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Jiraiya uses his Summoning Jutsu to call out Gamakichi. With Gamakichi leading the way, the shinobi advance up winding stairways and through long tunnels.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Sakura is cornered by Orochimaru! Just as Kabuto is about to hurl his kunai at her, Naruto comes running in.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Snatch, (2000, Thriller)
programme.desc: A diamond heist gone haywire launches gangsters, bookies, and a dog on a rollicking ride through the rugged world of bare-knuckle boxing in search of the missing stone. Critically acclaimed comedy from Guy Richie.

programme.title: Revolver, (2005, Action)
programme.desc: REVOLVER is populated with Guy Ritchie's (Snatch; Lock, Stock & Two Smoking Barrels) classic breed of fast-talking, sharp-suited gangsters but with a psychological twist that your mind may not be able to handle.

programme.title: Fargo, (1996, Thriller)
programme.desc: Things go awry when car salesman Jerry Lundegaard (William H. Macy) hires two thugs to kidnap his wife. Soon, the very pregnant and chipper Police Chief Marge Gunderson (Frances McDormand) takes the case. Is she up for the challenge? You betcha.

programme.title: The Usual Suspects, (1995, Thriller)
programme.desc: A gruesome scene adorns a pier in San Pedro, south of Los Angeles. Twenty-seven dead bodies. A burned-out ship smoldering in the harbor.

programme.title: True Confessions, (1981, Crime)
programme.desc: Two of the finest actors of our time, Robert De Niro and Robert Duvall, star in this must-see tale of two brothers set on a collision course as the result of a brutal murder in 1940s Los Angeles.

programme.title: Revolver, (2005, Action)
programme.desc: REVOLVER is populated with Guy Ritchie's (Snatch; Lock, Stock & Two Smoking Barrels) classic breed of fast-talking, sharp-suited gangsters but with a psychological twist that your mind may not be able to handle.

programme.title: 3000 Miles to Graceland, (2001, Action)
programme.desc: Posing as Elvis impersonators, ex-convicts rob a Las Vegas casino during an Elvis Presley fan convention, but greed and dissention among them ultimately lead to betrayal and chaos.

programme.title: The Godfather, (1972, Crime)
programme.desc: A chilling portrait of the Corleone family's rise and near fall from power in America along with balancing the story of the Sicilian clan's ugly crime business in which they are engaged.

programme.title: Almost Famous, (2000, Romance)
programme.desc: A high-school boy is given the chance to write a story for Rolling Stone Magazine about an up-and-coming rock band as he accompanies it on their concert tour.

programme.title: About Adam, (2001, Romantic comedy)
programme.desc: When carefree Lucy (Kate Hudson) finally meets her perfect man, Adam (Stuart Townsend), she's ready to give up her wild ways and settle down for good. But while Lucy is busy making plans for her wedding, Adam is busy charming the rest of her family!

programme.title: Hot Summer Nights, (2018, Crime)
programme.desc: An awkward teenager gets in over his head dealing drugs while falling for his business partner's enigmatic sister during one scorching summer in Cape Cod, Massachusetts.

programme.title: Zola, (2021, Thriller)
programme.desc: A waitress, strikes up a friendship with a customer, who seduces her to join a weekend in Florida. What seems like a glamorous trip transforms into a journey involving a pimp, a boyfriend, gangsters and adventures in this see-it-to-believe-it tale.

programme.title: The Adventures of Priscilla, Queen of the Desert, (1994, Comedy)
programme.desc: For three showgirls it was the dream of a lifetime, a four week cabaret engagement in Alice Springs. The problem is simply getting there intact, along with their bus Priscilla. It's not easy being a drag queen in the outback!

programme.title: The Adventures of Tintin, (2011, Action)
programme.desc: Tintin and his friends discover directions to a sunken ship commanded by Capt. Haddock's ancestor and go off on a treasure hunt.

programme.title: The Adventures of SharkBoy and Lavagirl, (2005, Science fiction)
programme.desc: From Robert Rodriguez, the director of the SPY KIDS franchise comes another superhero adventure for the entire family. This is the extraordinary tale of a girl with the force of a volcano who teams up with a boy raised by Great White sharks.

programme.title: The Adventures of Buckaroo Banzai Across the 8th Dimension, (1984, Science fiction)
programme.desc: Buckaroo Banzai is a rock-star/brain-surgeon/comic-book-hero/samurai who along with his group, the Hong Kong Cavaliers, must stop evil creatures from the 8th dimension (all named John) who are trying to conquer our dimension.

programme.title: The Adventures of Tintin, (2011, Action)
programme.desc: Tintin and his friends discover directions to a sunken ship commanded by Capt. Haddock's ancestor and go off on a treasure hunt.

programme.title: Kiss the Girls, (1997, Thriller)
programme.desc: Eight kidnapped women. All beautiful. All talented. All in danger of having their lives cut cruelly short if police detective Alex Cross and key witness Kate McTiernan can’t locate the elusive “collector” who calls himself Casanova.

programme.title: Jennifer Eight, (1992, Thriller)
programme.desc: They are the unidentified victims of an unsolved death spree, women linked by a killer’s gruesome handiwork and by police files giving them the code name “Jennifer.”

programme.title: Things To Do In Denver When You're Dead, (1995, Thriller)
programme.desc: An ex-gangster (Andy Garcia) reassembles his old gang for one last job. When things go awry and someone gets killed, Jimmy and his partners are marked for death, leaving Jimmy 48 hours to make things right for his buddies and the woman of his dreams.

programme.title: Bats, (1999, Creature Features)
programme.desc: Genetically mutated bats escape, and it's up to a bat expert and the local sheriff to stop them.

programme.title: Idle Hands, (1999, Comedy)
programme.desc: The devil will find work for idle hands to do, but what happens when he chooses the laziest teen slacker in the world to do his dirty work? Anton Tobias is a couch potato burn-out who can't control the murderous impulses of his possessed hand. Rated: R

programme.title: The Craft, (1996, Thriller)
programme.desc: Sarah has always been different. So as the new girl at St. Benedict's Academy, she immediately falls in with the high school outsiders. But these girls won't settle for being powerless misfits.

programme.title: From Dusk Till Dawn, (1996, Vampires)
programme.desc: In this thrilling cult classic, two dangerous outlaw brothers head out on a wild crime spree. After kidnapping a father and his two kids, the bad guys head to a seedy Mexican bar for safety but come face to face with blood-sucking vampires.

programme.title: From Dusk Till Dawn 2: Texas Blood Money, (1999, Vampires)
programme.desc: When a gang of bank robbers makes a run for the border, they wander into the wrong bar and mess with the wrong vampires. It's kill-or-be-killed in the ultimate battle to stop these evil creatures and save their own lives!

programme.title: Little Big Man, (1970, Western)
programme.desc: From director Arthur Penn (BONNIE AND CLYDE), Dustin Hoffman, Chief Dan George, Faye Dunaway, Martin Balsam, Jeff Corey and Richard Mulligan star in a genre-defying tale of an alleged 121-year-old white survivor of Custer's Last Stand.

programme.title: A Man Called Horse, (1970, Western)
programme.desc: Richard Harris stars as Lord John Morgan, captured by the Sioux in early 19th century America. After Morgan embraces the tribe's way of life, he faces the intense and painful Sun Vow ritual to test his dedication and commitment.

programme.title: The Return of A Man Called Horse, (1976, Western)
programme.desc: Richard Harris stars in this superior sequel which follows the plight of a horribly wronged tribe of Sioux Indians and the white man who would join in their revenge.

programme.title: The Hunting Party, (1971, Action)
programme.desc: To cattle baron Brandt Ruger (Gene Hackman), his stunning wife (Candice Bergen) is just one of his possessions. So when a notorious bandit kidnaps her, an enraged Ruger organizes a posse to recover his property dead or alive in the searing western!

programme.title: Little Big Man, (1970, Western)
programme.desc: From director Arthur Penn (BONNIE AND CLYDE), Dustin Hoffman, Chief Dan George, Faye Dunaway, Martin Balsam, Jeff Corey and Richard Mulligan star in a genre-defying tale of an alleged 121-year-old white survivor of Custer's Last Stand.

programme.title: Gator, (1976, Action)
programme.desc: The Feds want Gator McKlusky (Burt Reynolds) to go undercover to expose a local crime boss and former boyhood pal, Bama McCall. When Gator discovers Bama is involved in extortion, prostitution, and murder, the suspense builds to an explosive climax!

programme.title: Death Wish, (1974, Action)
programme.desc: In this explosive story of revenge and urban violence, Charles Bronson plays Paul Kersey, a bleeding-heart liberal who has a change of opinion after his wife and daughter are violently attacked by a gang of thugs in their apartment.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi and the gang have saved the world from Dartz and his Grand Dragon Leviathan, but they're about to face their biggest challenge yet.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi is trapped inside the Duel Dome, and the only way to escape is by defeating the Duel Computer, programmed with the skills of the world's top duelists. Since the Duel Computer has access to thousands of cards, how can Yugi win?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: It's the start of the KC Grand Championship! Sixteen of the world's greatest duelists vie for a chance to challenge Yugi as the King of Games!
programme.sub-title: Let the Games Begin! Part I

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: How does Apdnarg Otum know all of Joey's strategies? How can Joey stop Apdnarg when he gathers his ancient cards to unleash the fiercest monster from the great past? But the biggest mystery... how can Joey not know who Apdnarg Otum is?
programme.sub-title: Let the Games Begin! Part II

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: It's the second match of the KC Grand Championship as Rebecca faces the kung-fu kicking Asia champion Vivian Wong. However, there's more at stake than just winning the duel - Yugi's heart is on the line, whether he likes it or not.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The first round is over, leaving eight duelists to compete for the right to face Yugi for the KC Grand Championship. Unfortunately for Joey, his next opponent is Zigfried Lloyd, who defeated both Weevil and Rex Raptor in one turn.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Zigfried activates Ride of the Valkyries, the same card that defeated both Weevil and Rex Raptor at the same time.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: In the semifinals of the KC Grand Championship, it's a duel between child prodigies as Rebecca faces Leon Wilson and his fairy tale faction.
programme.sub-title: A Brawl in Small Town Part I

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi finds Grandpa's kidnapper, but is it really a kidnapping? While Yugi unravels the truth, Rebecca starts to unravel when her dragons fall prey to Leon's fervent fables. Rebecca must think of a new plan quickly or there will be no happy ending.
programme.sub-title: A Brawl in Small Town Part II

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: It's Zigfried vs. Leon for the right to challenge Yugi in the KC Grand Championship Finals... but Kaiba stops the duel!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: It's a battle between Zigfried and Kaiba. Zigfried quickly gains the advantage by destroying Kaiba's monsters before he can even draw them!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: It's Yugi vs. Leon for the title of King of Games at the KC Grand Championship! Something sinister lurks in the shadows, for this duel is more than just getting the crown. Zigfried's greatest revenge will commence as his real plan is unleashed.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Leon is Zigfried's younger brother, and he'll avenge his family's loss. Leon's fairy tales are giving Yugi nightmares but the worst is yet to come as Leon has Zigfried's mysterious and special card.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Golden Castle of Stromberg is infecting the world's Duel Disks with a virus that will destroy KaibaCorp. If Yugi doesn't destroy the card, the virus program can't be stopped.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The gang goes on an exotic trip to India, but when their plane crashes in a deserted forest, their vacation turns into a dangerous game of survival.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Realizing that they've become part of a real-life version of the Capsule Monsters board game, the gang struggles to find a way out.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Reunited at last, Yugi and his friends rejoice. But their celebration is soon interrupted by a pack of man-eating wolves, a giant turtle, and an angry Genie!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Grandpa translates an ancient stone tablet which directs the gang to locate the "Fortress of Fear." Now they have until sunset to find this mysterious structure or they'll be trapped in the world of Capsule Monsters forever.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi and his friends discover that in order to return home to the real world they must pass a series of tests: the Five Sacred Trials. The first of which pits them against enormous sand worms and a mysterious voice that travels with the desert wind.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: After narrowly escaping their battle in the desert, the gang finds themselves stranded on a mysterious floating island, where they face a monster that derives its strength from the sun.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: It's on to level three as Yugi and his friends are transported to a lava-covered wasteland. To make matters worse, Joey is possessed by an evil force, and destroying it may mean destroying Joey as well.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi and his friends are faced with an impossible task: locating a magical apple in a forest full of apple trees.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The gang stumbles upon a small kingdom dominated by a clan of fierce dragons known as The Fiendish Five. If they fail to slay these beasts, one of Yugi's friends must give up his soul!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi and his friends defeat the Fiendish Five…or so they think. These ferocious dragons have merged together and are now more powerful than ever!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Although the gang has passed the five sacred trials, the most dangerous test is yet to come. Now Yugi must face the spirit of Alexander the Great in an all-out Capsule Monsters war with the ultimate stakes!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi's friends are unconscious, leaving him to defeat Alexander the Great on his own!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Grandpa found the Millennium Puzzle decades ago, but little is known about the terrors, traps, turmoil, and treachery he faced to find the ancient artifact! See how it all began as we learn how Grandpa unearthed the Millennium Puzzle.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The evil spirit within the Millennium Ring has reunited with Bakura, prepped with a new monster to create the ultimate Shadow Game. And his first target is Kaiba!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi and friends go to the dawn of the duel, to the place where it all began, to the land where the Pharaoh's mysteries lie: Egypt.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The past is quickly becoming perilous as the fearless bandit king Bakura has invaded the Pharaoh's palace to take down the keepers of the seven Millennium Items single-handedly!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Even with the potent power of Obelisk the Tormentor, the Pharaoh couldn't prevent the bandit Bakura from escaping. Everyone knows that thief will return for a rematch, so Seto has a plan to create a powerful army.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Mahad vows to stop the bandit king Bakura's sneak attacks once and for all, but he may have made a promise he can't keep!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Mahad, the first of the Pharaoh's guardians, has fallen. Even worse, the bandit king Bakura now has the Millennium Ring, making his Diabound even more unstoppable!

programme.title: Luffy enters the Corrida Colosseum in order to compete for Ace's Flare-Flare Fruit! But with the mightiest warriors of the New World assembled and standing in his way, the competition will not be easy. The first stage of the competition is a battle royal.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Formidable, Unknown Warrior! Here Comes Lucy!

programme.title: While the deadly battle of Block A winds down, all the onlookers in the stadium are shocked to discover the secret identity of the winner! Meanwhile, Luffy's cover may be blown as another voice from the past returns.
programme.desc: One Piece

programme.title: Luffy meets an unexpected acquaintance from the past, Bellamy, who seems to be up to no good! Meanwhile, Caesar Handover Team encounters a snag when they learn just how dangerous Green Bit is!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Fateful Reunion! Bellamy the Hyena!

programme.title: The battle heats up and the widely despised Bartolomeo takes the ring! But he'll have to contend with both the Prodence Kingdom contingent, and Dressrosa's own local favorite, Bellamy! From up above, Luffy risks having his cover blown!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Super Rookie! Bartolomeo the Cannibal!

programme.title: Don Chinjao continues to provoke Luffy, hoping to gain revenge against the grandson of his sworn enemy, Garp! But as the argument continues, Luffy risks having his cover blown, and his identity revealed! Meanwhile, the battle in Block B rages.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Big Names Duke It Out! The Heated Block B Battle!

programme.title: The battle for Block B hits a crescendo as King Elizabello II prepares his devastating King Punch! But as the powerful attack becomes imminent, the Prodence Kingdom faction unravels! All that may be pointless, though.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Deadly Blow! The Astonishing King Punch!

programme.title: As the handover team approaches Green Bit, they are attacked by the fearsome fish that live off the coast of Dressrosa. But that's the least of their problems as they find the bridge to Green Bit has collapsed!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Fighting Fish Strike! Across the Deadly Iron Bridge!

programme.title: Zoro tracks the thief who stole his sword - and learns about a danger facing the Straw Hats! Meanwhile, Law, Usopp, and the others arrive at Green Bit only to find it inhabited by strange creatures, and swarming with the Navy soldiers!
programme.desc: One Piece

programme.title: All but done for, Sanji is trapped by Violet and her crew when she suddenly changes her mind and mysteriously turns on her own men! Meanwhile, Robin and Usopp come face to face with the Little People known as the Tontatta Tribe.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Unknown World! The Tontatta Kingdom!

programme.title: Sanji gets in touch with Law in order to share a shocking secret - that could unsettle the Straw Hats' plans in Dressrosa for good! Meanwhile, Luffy's Block C battle begins, but will his Gum-Gum powers give him away?
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Stratagem of the Century! Doflamingo Makes His Move!

programme.title: Sanji and Franky try to regroup after Doflamingo's betrayal, hoping that destroying the factory is not yet out of their grasp. Meanwhile Luffy makes a friend in the Colosseum and Usopp ends up thrust into an uncomfortable position!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Shaking Heaven and Earth! Admiral Fujitora's Power!

programme.title: The Sunny is mysteriously deformed by the bizarre powers of Giolla! Can Nami, Chopper, and Brook act in time to save their beloved home? Meanwhile, the battle for Block C continues as Luffy suffers a staggering setback.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Blow of Anger! A Giant vs. Lucy!

programme.title: After knocking down the Giant, Hajrudin, as payback for what he did to Ucy, Luffy has to deal with Ideo, whose punch has the destructive force of a bomb, while the Funk Brothers show off their bizarre fighting technique.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Destruction Cannon Blasts! Lucy in Trouble!

programme.title: Nami, Chopper, and Brooke keep trying to evade Jora and win back the Sunny even though it's been turned into a piece of art! In the Colosseum, Don Chin Jao finally faces Luffy - whose power will prove greater?
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Legendary Pirate! Don Chin Jao!

programme.title: Luffy stands along against Don Chinjao, and learns about the old grudge he bears against Garp! Meanwhile, Usopp and Robin get swept up in the Tontatta Kingdom's raid against the royal family, and Franky learns the eerie secret of Dressrosa.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Light and Shadow! Darkness behind Dressrosa!

programme.title: The Tontatta Kingdom gears up for its all-out assault on the Doflamingo Family, as Usopp and Robin are caught up in the war effort! Meanwhile, Franky arrives the headquarters of the toy movement where he finds Zoro, Nami & the others are cornered by Jora.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Making a Sortie! The Legendary Hero Usoland!

programme.title: Don Chin Jao's hatred of Garp and Luffy is finally explained, while his battle against Luffy comes to an end. With tremendous power, one of them is squarely eliminated! But is that really the end of the Colosseum battle?
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Fierce Battle Coming to the End! Lucy vs. Chin Jao!

programme.title: With the battle with Don Chinjao long behind him, Luffy advances to the final round! Block-D contender Cavendish, however, takes the chance and pounces on Luffy, who is defended by an unlikely ally! The agenda of Colosseum gladiator Rebecca is exposed.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Luffy and the Gladiator of Fate - Rebecca!

programme.title: Rebecca's deep bonds with the one-legged toy soldier are revealed! Her lineage can be traced to the previous ruler of Dressrosa - and her eternal bond with the damaged toy is linked to the violent overthrow of that regime by none other than Doflamingo!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Protect You to the End! Rebecca and the Toy Soldier!

programme.title: As Rebecca enters the ring for the battle for Block D, the crowd shows its contempt for her heritage - only to be scolded by an unlikely supporter. Meanwhile, the other Straw Hats start to reassemble to deal with the attack on the Sunny.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Last - and Bloodiest - Block! Block D Battle Begins!

programme.title: Doflamingo recounts for Law the surprising history of the Don Quixote Family, while Nami and the others battle the insane and powerful artist, Giolla! Her ultimate attack renders them incapacitated, and prompts the betrayal of one of their closest allies!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Decisive Battle! Giolla vs. the Straw Hats!

programme.title: Law is pinned by Fujitora, and Doflamingo has the upper hand! Only the most cunning of tricks could save Law's plan to hand Caesar over to Nami & the others! Meanwhile, the Sunny falls into danger again, & the battle for Block D heats up in the Colosseum.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Beautiful Sword! Cavendish of the White Horse!

programme.title: Law must put himself in harm's way to defend the Sunny and the Straw Hats from Doflamingo's all-out assault! With barely enough time to save the crew, plans change and send the Sunny on a new mission -- but will it be able to get underway?
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Big Clash! Sanji vs. Doflamingo!

programme.title: Law & Doflamingo are embroiled in a heated showdown which triggers Momonosuke's memories of Doflamingo's cruelty from the first time they met; meanwhile, after a tearful fanboy conversation Zoro finally gets to see Luffy but all eyes are fixed on Rebecca.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Rebecca's Special Attack! Last-Ditch Sword Dance!

programme.title: Bartolomeo searches the Colosseum for Luffy but stumbles upon the medical center for the losers of the battles in the ring, but is everything at this center as it seems? Meanwhile, Rebecca has to fend off Rolling Logan's vicious bone-crushing grip attack.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Most Violent Fighter! Logan vs. Rebecca!

programme.title: The losers of the Colosseum battle who are being held below the infirmary have a surprising person in their midst! But do they have a clue as to their terrifying fate? Meanwhile, the Tontatta Kingdom's history is made clear.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Big Surprise! The True Identity of the Toy Soldier!

programme.title: Bartolomeo finally finds Luffy and starts to lead him to Zoro, while the toy soldier begins to tell the heart-breaking story of how Doflamingo cheated the Riku dynasty out of their control of Dressrosa!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Horrible Past! The Secret of Dressrosa!

programme.title: As the toy soldier's story continues, the sad fate of King Riku and his army, and his daughter Princess Viola, is revealed as well as how the people of Dressrosa fell into the hands of Doflamingo. And all the toys in the country share a mysterious secret.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Nightmare! The Tragic Night of Dressrosa!

programme.title: Zoro, Kin'emon, and Luffy are reunited again, but little do they know that their reunion is being monitored by a potential threat! Meanwhile, the battle rages on between Doflamingo and Law as these two powerhouses clash.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Showdown Between the Warlords! Law vs. Doflamingo!

programme.title: Zoro and Kin'emon make a mad dash to save Law but Navy Admiral Fujitora stands in their way, bringing his full power against them. The Navy is in hot pursuit as a ship approaches with unexpected visitors from the past.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Two Great Rivals Meet Each Other! Straw Hat and Heavenly Demon!

programme.title: After revealing the horrible history of Dressrosa, Toy Soldier now shares their plan to liberate the Tontatta Kingdom and bring down the Doflamingo Family, Operation SOP. Luffy bumps into a heavily-wounded Bellamy and Bartolomeo
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Luffy Astonished! The Man Who Inherits Ace's Will!

programme.title: Usopp and Robin make their way via an underground tunnel dug by the tiny people of the Tontatta Tribe - a tunnel so small in fact, that Franky couldn't fit! Instead, Franky makes his way to the Toy House.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Operation SOP Starts! Usoland Charges Forth!

programme.title: As the contenders for the battle of Block D dwindle to only thirty, Rebecca has her hands full with the menacing Suleiman the Beheader! All hope seems lost that she can take him down and move on to the finals!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Burning Passion! Rebecca vs. Suleiman!

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin learns that a treasure trove lies in a volcano on Cleo Island, but it can only be reached when the mountain isn't spewing molten lava! He tries to convince Jigen and Goemon to join him but they're not interested.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Fujiko informs Lupin that fine quality diamonds from South Africa are stored in a safe of a global syndicate and importer of diamonds. Lupin makes his way as a worker in the boiler room, and steals the loot of diamonds.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin finds out about the jewel "Poison Trio" of the Borges family and decides to steal it after Fujiko goads him. Galdan, the nephew of Lucricia greets Lupin, and tells him that elderly Lucricia had been arrested and must be broken out of jail.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin goes on a safe-cracking rampage and rakes in 10 million francs. He needs the money to purchase the world's only rare Gold Butterfly at an auction. But Lupin drops the 10 million francs while on the run…

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin scopes a jewelry museum where the billion-dollar gem Cleopatra's Tear is displayed. But Lupin can't get to it because the display case is secured by high-voltage electricity.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: No thief has ever succeeded in stealing the secret gem of Pompeii's nunnery; it's guarded by venomous snakes. Even Arsene Lupin gave up on it, since he hates snakes. But Lupin takes on the challenge. Will Lupin succeed? And what kind of secret gem is it?

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Though the tycoon Steel had replaced all his bodily organs with artificial organs to live, he's told that he only has a week to live. There is only one way he could prolong his life, which is to receive a brain transplant and he wants Lupin's Brain.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Famous gourmand and field mice scientist Salmon Whitney is also known as being the chairman of a Canadian diamond mining operation. Lupin is after his diamonds, which will go on auction in Paris.
programme.sub-title: The Wolf Runs and the Pig Rolls

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Coaxed by Fujiko, Lupin decides to steal the diamond chandelier at the Kremlin Palace. He disguises himself as Zenigata and infiltrates the palace, but government police soldier Natasha captures him and throws him in the slammer.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: England's Lord Weather provokes Lupin with a bet, and dares him to steal Red Arrow away from him. Lupin takes the challenge as it's a matter of pride, but Jigen wants no part of it because he and Weather are gambling buddies.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Miami Bank is on the verge of bankruptcy after its last customers closed their accounts. The bank manager Garlic devises a plan to revive the bank, and drums up news that his bank had been raided by Lupin; he also asks Lupin to really do it.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Thief brothers Nanja-Monja have been in the business since the days of Arsène Lupin; they decide to induct Lupin as a tourist attraction for the Republic of Karchina. But first they abduct Fujiko.
programme.sub-title: Hair Breadth Rescue Operation for Fujiko

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Fujiko joins Lupin and gang who are camping and cooking Sukiyaki; people are hunting Fujiko, and gunfire is exchanged. Fujiko gets captured and Lupin's Sukiyaki meal gets ruined, but he finds an atomic bomb's detonator plug inside of the Sukiyaki bowl.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Genius prodigy boy Romanoff has ten doctorates from Russia's Public Academy; blustering that no greater than he exists, he challenges Lupin. Since Fujiko is involved, Lupin cannot back down; what will become of this challenge?

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Fujiko is the model for Norway's famous sculptor Vingel's crystal mermaid statue; she believed when he said he would give it to her the day it was finished, but Vingel gets greedy and sells it to the mayor of the city of Bergen instead.
programme.sub-title: The Mermaid That Disappears in the Midnight Sun

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin tries to steal a bunch of diamonds from a diamond auction. But the auction auditorium is at the Marine Tower above a skyscraper, and there is only one transparent elevator to get there.
programme.sub-title: The Target is Five Hundred and Fifty Five Meters Away

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin heads to Mecca to steal Mohammed's treasure. But first he is confronted by Patra Lawrence, the grandaughter of the Lawrence of Arabia, who is the chief of Mecca's special police headquarters; how will Lupin steal the treasure now?

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: As usual, Fujiko instigates Lupin and friends to go steal; this time their target is the Jovich Piano installed in a music hall built around it. There is no door large enough in the hall to carry the piano out.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin is after the shipment of raw diamonds that arrived at a harbor in Nice; he sneaks into the storage in the middle of the night but Zenigata was on to him. Lupin escapes with the help of Jigen and Goemon, but Fujiko gets captured.
programme.sub-title: To Arrest Lupin, the Mission at Highway

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: A month ago, president Gappolini of one of the world's top five trading companies, had died. Gappolini bequeathed a will saying that the heir to the company presidency will be the world's finest sharpshooter and Jigen is a target.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: It's said that immense sums of money confiscated from organized crime get transported to a Swiss bank by ICPO, once a year. Naturally, Lupin wants a piece of that action, so he steals the armed security vehicle along with Zenigata in it.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: The city of Grand Hexagon lies at the border of France and Spain; the city is designed with six sides. But at the center of the city is Raika Bank storing fifty tons of gold bullion; an alarm will go off if even one bullion is missing.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Robot soldier Lamda flies above the sky of Tokyo, raids a jewelry store. Its creator, professor Oyamada's daughter Maki and Lupin say that it was just a show to demonstrate the inhumanity of robots.

programme.title: LUPIN THE 3rd: Voyage to Danger
programme.desc: Someone sent orders to assassinate Lupin. Will he survive or die trying!?

programme.title: LUPIN THE 3rd TVSP #6 Dragon of Doom
programme.desc: On the bottom of the ocean, within the sunken Titanic, the golden dragon statue waits. When Lupin and the gang are hired to retrieve it, Goemon recognizes the dragon as one of his clan's treasures. Now, he's ready to fight his own friends to protect it!

programme.title: LUPIN THE 3rd TVSP #7 The Pursuit of Harimao's Treasure
programme.desc: To retrieve the Harimao's Treasure, Lupin and the gang must gather three lost statues. Lupin reluctantly partners with the aging "double-O" MI-6 agent Sir Archer and his granddaughter Diana to gather the statues.

programme.title: Lara Croft: Tomb Raider, (2001, Action)
programme.desc: Exploring lost empires and finding priceless treasures... it's all in a day's work for Lara Croft. Though, a secret from her father's past is about to lead Lara to her greatest challenge.

programme.title: Lara Croft Tomb Raider: The Cradle of Life, (2003, Action)
programme.desc: Lara Croft sets out on a quest to save Pandora's box from landing into the wrong hands. Join her as she races through furious hand-to-hand battles, blazing shoot-outs and breathtaking sky-diving escapes to try to save the ancient artifact.

programme.title: Tomb Raider, (2018, Action)
programme.desc: Armed with only her sharp mind, blind faith and stubborn spirit, young Lara Croft pushes past her limits on her very first perilous adventure into the unknown. If she survives, it could be the making of her…earning her the name tomb raider.

programme.title: Robocop, (2014, Science fiction)
programme.desc: In 2028 Detroit, when Alex Murphy (Joel Kinnaman) -- a loving husband, father and good cop -- is critically injured in the line of duty, the multinational conglomerate OmniCorp sees their chance for a part-man, part-robot police officer.

programme.title: Fast Color, (2019, Science fiction)
programme.desc: Hunted by mysterious forces and a local sheriff, a young woman with supernatural abilities flees back to her family—and unearths the depths of the power within her.

programme.title: Deep Impact, (1998, Science fiction)
programme.desc: When a couple of young astronomers discover an enormous comet on course to collide with Earth, the countdown to doomsday begins and the human race embarks on the fight for survival.

programme.title: 57 Seconds, (2024, Science fiction)
programme.desc: Josh Hutcherson and Morgan Freeman star in this heart-racing action thriller. Every second counts for a tech blogger who wields a time-altering device to seek revenge on a ruthless corporate empire and ignites a pulse-pounding battle for survival.

programme.title: Robocop, (1987, Action)
programme.desc: Detroit in the near future. A cop who dies in the line of duty is transformed into a crime-fighting cyborg by the corporation which now runs the police department. The only hitch: this "perfect" cop still seeks revenge on the creeps who mutilated him.

programme.title: The Sons of Katie Elder, (1965, Western)
programme.desc: The four rowdy sons of Katie Elder return home for her funeral and to avenge her death.

programme.title: Rio Grande, (1950, Western)
programme.desc: Lt. Col. Yorke leads his cavalry troops to the Rio Grande to fight a warring tribe. Yorke’s toughest battle lies ahead when his unorthodox plan to outwit the elusive Apaches leads to possible court-martial.

programme.title: Hondo, (1953, Western)
programme.desc: John Wayne plays Hondo Lane, a cavalry rider who becomes the protector of Angie Lowe as well as a father figure to her boy, Johnny. Angie, determinedly awaiting the return of her husband, refuses to leave their homestead despite the growing danger.

programme.title: Dakota, (1945, Western)
programme.desc: In 1871 Dakota, two crooked businessmen oppose the local wheat farmers and the railroad development, in order to control the town of Fargo.

programme.title: The Kentuckian, (1955, Western)
programme.desc: Eli Wakefield (Burt Lancaster) and his son are Kentucky adventurers longing for life on the Texas frontier. They learn, however, that their greatest challenge lies not in the uncharted wilderness, but in the people they meet along the way.

programme.title: Cariboo Trail, (1950, Western)
programme.desc: Montanans Jim Redfern and Mike Evans head into Canada's British Columbia via the Cariboo Trail intent to raise cattle and dig for gold but find trouble instead.

programme.title: The Halliday Brand, (1957, Western)
programme.desc: A western about a young man's (Joseph Cotten) disillusionment with his father (Ward Bond), a corrupt sheriff. When his dad turns away from the lynching of his sister's lover, the boy rebels and his father declares him an 'outlaw.'

programme.title: Fort Yuma, (1955, Western)
programme.desc: When a revered Apache chief is brutally murdered en route to Fort Yuma to negotiate a peace treaty, all-out war erupts in this rousing -- and surprisingly touching -- western starring Peter Graves and directed by the legendary Lesley Selander.

programme.title: Little Big Man, (1970, Western)
programme.desc: From director Arthur Penn (BONNIE AND CLYDE), Dustin Hoffman, Chief Dan George, Faye Dunaway, Martin Balsam, Jeff Corey and Richard Mulligan star in a genre-defying tale of an alleged 121-year-old white survivor of Custer's Last Stand.

programme.title: Up in the Air, (2009, Inspirational Drama)
programme.desc: Ryan (George Clooney) flies all over for work, but after meeting a passenger he learns that life isn't about the journey, but the connections we make along the way.

programme.title: The Great Raid, (2005, Action)
programme.desc: As World War II rages, the elite 6th Ranger Battalion is given a mission of heroic proportions: push 30 miles behind enemy lines and liberate over 500 American prisoners of war.

programme.title: The Lookout, (2007, Thriller)
programme.desc: Chris "Slapshot" Pratt, whose once-bright future has been dimmed by a severe head injury, is a night janitor at a bank. Lonely and frustrated, he falls prey to a con man and agrees to help rob the bank where he works.

programme.title: Crossover, (2006, Inspirational Drama)
programme.desc: The lives of a gifted athlete and his best friend change when they take a fateful trip to Los Angeles. The young hopefuls must use every skill at their command to topple the reigning street ball champions from their thrones.

programme.title: Old School, (2003, Comedy)
programme.desc: Three men are disenchanted with life and try to recapture their college days.

programme.title: Man of the House, (2005, Comedy)
programme.desc: A hard-edged Texas Ranger goes undercover to protect a group of college cheerleaders after they witness a murder.

programme.title: The Animal, (2001, Comedy)
programme.desc: A wannabe cop suffers a horrible car accident, and is repaired by a mad scientist who uses animal parts. Problems arise when the animal parts begin to take over.

programme.title: Old School, (2003, Comedy)
programme.desc: Three men are disenchanted with life and try to recapture their college days.

programme.title: Daryl and a small group set out on foot in search of medicine, but their mission faces obstacles; Rick and Carol find two uninfected stragglers in a nearby town.

programme.desc: The Walking Dead

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Usagi and her friends visit a new planetarium, which has opened in the Juban District. Mimete attacks with Daimon u Choten.
programme.sub-title: The Messiah of Silence Awakens? Stars of Destiny

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Usagi and her friends sneak into Mugen Academy in search of Hotaru, who has gone missing.
programme.sub-title: An Invasion from Another Dimension: Mystery of Mugen Academy

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: A new variety of flower called Tellun is being sold at a flower shop in the Juban District.
programme.sub-title: A Bewitching Flower That Steals Hearts: Tellu, the Third Witch

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Usagi and the others sneak into the practice examination site of the Mugen Academy. They meet Yui Bido who takes an interest in Ami's intelligence.
programme.sub-title: Believe in Love: Ami, the Kindhearted Guardian

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Cyprine manages to steal pure hearts from the students of Mugen Academy. Kaolinite takes notice of Chibi-Usa's power and kidnaps her!
programme.sub-title: Shadow of Destruction: The Messiah of Silence Awakens

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: The revived Mistress 9 attempts to call Pharaoh 90, an energy life-form from another dimension, to Earth.
programme.sub-title: The Coming Terror of Darkness: Struggle of the Eight Guardians

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Hotaru’s and Mistress 9’s consciousnesses engage in a fierce battle. Sailor Moon gives up the Holy Grail to Souichi Tomoe to save Hotaru’s heart.
programme.sub-title: The Shining Shooting Star: Saturn and the Messiah

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Following the fight with Pharaoh 90, Usagi and her friends search for Hotaru in the ruins of Mugen Academy.
programme.sub-title: A New Life: Parting of the Stars of Destiny

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: The Door of Space and Time is opened, allowing Chibi-Usa to return to the future.
programme.sub-title: A Guardian's Realization: Strength Lies Within a Pure Heart

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Chibi-Usa follows a beautiful light into the forest. The owner of that light is Pegasus and he asks Chibi-Usa to keep their meeting a secret.
programme.sub-title: Meeting of Destiny: The Night Pegasus Dances

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: In order to capture Pegasus as their first step in world conquest, Zirconia orders her subordinates to seek out people with beautiful dreams.
programme.sub-title: Super Transformation Once Again: Pegasus's Power

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Having a taste for older woman, Hawk's Eye sets his sights on Usagi's mother, Ikuko.
programme.sub-title: Protect Mom's Dream: Double Moon's New Attack

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Tiger’s Eye approaches Naru in a plot to capture Pegasus in a subspace cage invented by Hawk’s Eye.

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Two of Mamoru’s friends from college, Saori and Kobayashi, pay him a visit at his apartment in the hopes of meeting his girlfriend Usagi.
programme.sub-title: The Perfect Couple: Usagi and Mamoru's Love

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Mamoru is helping Usagi and Chibi-Usa with their studies when Luna and Artemis walk in, having a huge fight.
programme.sub-title: Artemis is Cheating? Enter the Mysterious Kitten

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: The girls learn that Tomoko Takase, author of the best-selling book The Moon Night Pegasus, used to be Makoto's classmate from her previous school.
programme.sub-title: Makoto's Friendship: The Girl Who Admired Pegasus

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Tiger's Eye hatches a plan to capture Pegasus by using a Lemures that can enter other people's shadow and control them from within.

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: A small fire incident leaves Mamoru's apartment in a total mess, forcing him to stay at Rei's place for the time being.

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Chibi-Usa bumps into a young man after becoming enthralled in a beautiful illustration book she had Usagi buy for her.
programme.sub-title: Forest of Illusion: A Beautiful Fairy's Invitation

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Ami is shocked when she sees Mamoru coming out of his apartment with another woman.
programme.sub-title: Drive to the Heavens: The Dream Car Fueled with Love

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Chibi-Usa befriends Miharu, who is aiming to be the best swordwoman in Japan.
programme.sub-title: Aiming for the Top: The Pretty Swordswoman's Dilemma

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Yoshiki Usui’s new store opens. Usagi and her friends head out to see the fashion show, along with Fish’s Eye, who is captivated by Usui's good looks.
programme.sub-title: We Love Fashion: The Stylish Guardians

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Usagi spots Minako out on a date with a handsome man. To everyone's surprise, the boyfriend is different from the one Usagi saw earlier.
programme.sub-title: Storm of Love: Minako's Grand Two-Timing Plan

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: An old woman named Mayako lives alone in a mansion. Mayako is very distrustful of strangers, believing they are after her wealth and fortune.
programme.sub-title: The Secret Mansion: A Menu of Love for You

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Reports of Pegasus attacking the town cause Usagi and the other Sailor Guardians to have doubts about whether Pegasus can be trusted or not.
programme.sub-title: Believe in Pegasus: The Four Guardians' Super Transformation

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Usagi and her friends are enjoying their summer vacation by the beach. Shingo is acting as their bodyguard—especially for Ami, whom he has a crush on.
programme.sub-title: Shining Summer Days: Ami Under the Sea-Breeze

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Usagi and Chibi-Usa see an ad for a free ballet lesson and sign up. As they practice, Fish’s Eye draws the class's attention with his dancing skills.

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Usagi and Chibi-Usa meet a woman named Rubina who follows them. Rubina is a princess who snuck out to experience life outside of her royal duties.

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Usagi and the girls attend the school festival. Makoto is asked to dance by a handsome man, who is actually Tiger's Eye in disguise.

programme.desc: Um ex-coronel das forças especiais se torna um vigilante que mata criminosos, enquanto um ex-colega quer detê-lo.
